text: Ignazio Oliva (17th century) was an Italian painter of the Baroque period, active near his natal city of Orta di Atella. He was a pupil of Domenico Gargiulo. He is known for painting outdoor vedute: seascapes and landscapes. ==References== * Category:17th-century Neapolitan people Category:Neapolitan painters Category:Italian Baroque painters Category:Italian landscape painters Category:Year of death unknown Category:Year of birth unknown
title: Ignazio Oliva
